transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ji sir, main Riya bol rahi hun IndiaMART head office se baat hui thi na hamari sir services ke regarding.
Customer: Mam services bahut problem create kar rahi hai main bilkul bilkul bahut jyada pareshan ho gaya aapki services se. Na buyleads generate ho pa rahi hai. Don't be. Haan ji apna catalog related concern bhi to dala hai quality is not good. of buyleads bhi nahi generate ho rahi hai jo buyleads hai pehli baat to aa hi nahi rahi hai to usme genuine aur in genuine ka to koi sawal hi nahi hai. Hmm hmm. Buyleads ka flow bahut low ho gaya hai hamare mein hamare mein dikhte hi nahi din bhar mein ek ek do buyleads aati hai khali. Ab bataye 40 buyleads uthane ki capacity hai 20 buyleads aa rahi hai 20 buyleads waste ho ja rahi hai meri hum utha hi nahi pa rahe jab aa hi nahi to hum kaise uthaye. Hmm hmm. Bas hame bas aap hame ye mat batayega ki hame kya karna hai is bare mein kyuki hum aapka AI nahi chala rahe hain. Hmm. Hmm ab bataye aap khali itna bataye buyleads kyu nahi aa rahi hai. Kyu buyleads kam hai?
Executive: Main batati hun aapko buyleads kam buyleads ka number kam hai ya convert kam ho rahi hai wo number kam hai number of quantity kam hai. Dekhiye main aapko bata deti hun yaha pe aapki buylead ka jo number ka issue hai na sir wo total inquiry kitni generate ho rahi hai IndiaMART se aur usme se aapke pass kitni aa rahi hai wo bhi depend karta hai.
Dekhiye jaise main aapko bhi yaha pe bata deti hun aapki abhi jaise aapki aapki profile pe hun main India ka filter laga hai main recently pe mujhe bhi do minute char minute panch minute pehle ki leads number to mujhe kafi dikh rahe hai aapko kya jis time pe aap dekh rahe hain us time pe leads kam hai kya aapko purani leads dikh rahi hai kaisi dikh rahi hai ye?
Customer: Matlab purani ka matlab ye hai ki mere category ki lead nahi na India matlab pura India kar raha hai mujhe kya matlab hai main Lucknow se matlab hai.
Executive: Aapko sirf Lucknow se matlab hai hanji. Bas haan haan sirf hame Lucknow ki buyleads chahiye.
Customer: Hame India nahi chahiye. Hmm hmm. Kuch usme theek hai aapka Lucknow aur Barabanki major cities mein bana hua hai baki ka nau aapne exclude kiya hai Gujarat, West Bengal, Pune, Hyderabad, Mumbai. To yani aap fir apne near by areas ka filter laga ke dekhte hain hai na? Haan haan. To abhi hame India gypsum false ceiling board ki ek ghante pehle Lucknow se hi dikh rahi hai 24 square feet ki. Fir do ghante pehle furniture installation service Lucknow se panch piece ki. Lucknow ki to kafi leads possible hai sir. Mam chhoti chhoti buyleads hai 24 square feet kya hota hai wo ₹1000 ka kam hai usko kaun karne jayega. Theek hai uske alawa. Sir mam aap rukiye call kare main drive kar raha hun.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are not being generated.

- Catalog quality is not good.

- Wants buyleads from Lucknow only.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about lead generation process.

- Executive checked the profile and informed about leads.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, location
